item.title: Ahoy!
item.description: What is Ahoy? Ahoy! is a community we always wanted to be a part of. As a result of not finding such a place, we decided to create one ourselves.

item.title: Design Maestro
item.description: What is Design Maestro? This is a set of macros for [[Optimization/Tools/Keyboard Maestro]], designed for designers working in [[Optimization/Tools/Figma]] and [[Optimization/Tools/Webflow]] and using the capabilities of [[macOS]].

item.title: EasyBanner
item.description: What is EasyBanner? EasyBanner is my microservice to generate jpg / png / pdf files based on HTML / CSS code.

item.title: EasyCart
item.description: What is EasyCart? EasyCart is a project that facilitates sales in digital products. Its biggest competitive advantage is its UX (e.

item.title: EasyLegal
item.description: What is EasyLegal? EasyLegal is a tool for generating the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy necessary for the operation of the website and store.

item.title: EasyLove
item.description: What is EasyLove? It’s a tool that facilitates the process of collecting and sharing customer reviews. Customer reviews are one of the most essential elements of marketing and sales and yet they are often overlooked or lost amidst emails and Social Media comments.

item.title: EasyTimer
item.description: What is EasyTimer? It is a generator of countdown timers that can be used in email campaigns. The application generates a timer that counts down to the indicated date.

item.title: eduweb
item.description: [[Projects/eduweb]] is a project that I have been involved in since April 2020. It has a special meaning for me, because it was on eduweb that I started to seriously learn programming.

item.title: overment
item.description: overment is a YouTube channel dedicated to programmers. The whole project is based on the most important principle for me which is [[Respect for Time]] both mine and others.

item.title: zautomatyzowani
item.description: [[Projects/zautomatyzowani]] is a project that I set up together with [[Grzegorz RÃ³g]] ([[Projects/eduweb]]) to demonstrate our approach to [[Optimization/Automation/Automation]], The use of [[Knowledge/Programming/No-Code]] tools and doing business online more broadly.
